name: BETWEEN (Fares K)
description:
BETWEEN is a third person role playing, fantasy, adventure game focused on the feelings-love and relationships. David is the main character of this game, who is living with the beautiful memories that he had with his late wife Catharine. David tries to recollect this memories that he had through his dreams and wishes to live in it. For him dreams then turns to reality.

Key Features :

> The game comes with a heart touching story and message.

> Simple and short game with a beautiful experience.

> Relaxing music that makes you feel the game and characters emotions.

> Gorgeous atmospheres.

Made by : Fares K

Contact me : floatingfrondgames@gmail.com
